stanza.line: Unthrifty loveliness why dost thou spendspend
Upon thy self thy beauty legacylegacy
Nature bequest gives nothing but doth lendlend
And being frank she lends to those are freefree
Then beauteous niggard why dost thou abuseabuse
The bounteous largess given thee to givegive
Profitless usurer why dost thou useuse
So great a sum of sums yet canst not livelive
For having traffic with thy self alonealone
Thou of thy self thy sweet self dost deceivedeceive
Then how when nature calls thee to be gonegone
What acceptable audit canst thou leaveleave
Thy unused beauty must be tombed with theethee
Which used lives th executor to bebe
